tool_description: Validates credit decisions against company policies, regulatory requirements, and compliance standards to ensure all credit actions meet established guidelines.

policy_version.description: Version of credit policy to validate against

error_messages: Invalid customer_id: Customer identifier cannot be empty.
Invalid proposed_credit_limit: Credit limit must be a positive number.
Invalid customer_risk_rating: Must be one of [Low, Medium, High, Critical].
Invalid policy_version: Policy version not found in system.
Policy violation: Proposed credit limit exceeds policy maximum for the given risk rating.
usage: Provide customer_id, proposed_credit_limit, and customer_risk_rating. Optionally specify policy_version to validate against a specific version. The tool checks compliance with all applicable policies and regulations.

policy_compliant.description: Whether the proposal complies with all policies

policy_violations.description: List of specific policy violations found

required_approvals.description: Required approval levels for the proposed decision

validation_date.description: Date when validation was performed in date-time format
